attributes.title: it’s orange
attributes.review: so like this app is no thank you from me you guys. when I opened it I saw an orange. but what does that have to do with a president? i’m so very confused. it is so orange like all I see now is orange someone take me to a hospital to make me stop seeing orangeness lololo like I look like this 🍊👄🍊ehehehehebehe oh no I pooped ahaha 🤭🤫🙉🙊🐒🌚🌝😼😔❤️🍊‼️🥶✨🤞🏼🦈🐋🥩🧃🏉🚢🚇🏎🦯🏨⌛️🦠🚬💋🍑

The app’s features was really terrible and instead of the president’s✨✨✨ face all I saw was 🍊🇺🇸 but it took too long to even load but I guess I support yea never gonna happen overall this app wasn’t convenient it kept crashing 🧚🏻‍♂️✨✨✨✨ have a good day people ✨✨✨✨🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app keeps making my phone crash even though it is capable of handling this app. It used my location multiple times without my permission. I fell down the stairs and broke my nose because of this app and seeing the orange on my screen. Overall HORRIBLE APP

attributes.title: No❤️✨🧚🏻
attributes.review: Just no in general. This app disgusts me, I saw a bunch of pictures of animals being harassed by Peaches (aka Brittany Johnson) and Trump humping a huge Cheeto, I am horrified and do not support this app at all, a horrible app sent from hell itself. He is a horrible president and I bet he is a glizzy gobbler, he needs to be taken out of the office ASAP

attributes.title: I got Chlamydia from this app.
attributes.review: I am absolutely DISGRACED ✨🥰 by this app 🧚‍♀️ i OPENED it 🧚🏻‍♀️ and it asked me for money 😽 and my phone NUMBER 🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕 i gave it my phone number 👄✨ and my 🐱 STARTED 🧚🏻‍♀️❤️ to itch 🧚‍♀️✨ immediately. 🥰✨ every time I would get a text and the app 💕asked me for money i would 😽👄 feel ill ❤️🥰 so PLEASE do not 🧚🏻‍♀️✨ get this app EVER. 👁

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: Once i downloaded this app, my phone started to glitch and wipe my data from my phone. I beg of everyone to not download this app because you can lose very important information. Thank you for your contribution.

attributes.title: Crashes and doesn’t work... horribel
attributes.review: I just wanted to download the app to further celebrate our amazing orange-looking obese dementia-riddled President, but it kept crashing and the buttons didn’t work🙄🙄🙄do better ... now all i have to learn more about trump is tiktok😊😊😊Tiktok is an amazing app in which trump supporters love😍

attributes.title: COMPLETE SCAM
attributes.review: I wanted to join the app to see what trumps plans were on his campaign and see if there’s any information there that hasn’t been shared. But you can’t join or see anything without adding your number first and I refuse to do that. This app is a scam do not get it at all!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is disgusting. It made my eyes burn the moment I opened it. By far the worst app Apple has had. My eyes still feel like they’re about to burst because the first thing I saw was that Cheetos face ..🤮 MY EYE B A L L is literally going to come out. This app is a DANGER to society and should have never been created 🧚‍♀️💫✨ ok now, toodles.

I wanted to see some campaign things and strategies, but the second I opened this app there was an ugly Oompa Loompa picture taking up my entire screen. I couldn’t handle it. It made me want to fall of the leaning tower of pizza 🍕. I would never could never recommend this app.
